chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface

Goal:
forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> currentTerm st <= currentTerm st'

Premises:
term = nat : Set
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
handleAppendEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) (state : raft_data) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) => if t <? currentTerm state then (state, AppendEntriesReply (currentTerm state) entries false) else if prevLogIndex =? 0 then if haveNewEntries state entries then (RaftState.set_raft_data_leaderId term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_type term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_commit
Notation currentTerm := (RaftState.currentTerm term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntriesReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%list_scope _%bool_scope
*** [ Core.ByteListReader.t : Type -> Type ] Arguments Core.ByteListReader.t _%type_scope
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
logIndex = nat : Set
handleAppendEntries_same_lastApplied : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_append_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> gd = update_elections_data_appendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p))...
msg_ind : forall P : msg -> Prop, (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term), P (RequestVote t n l t0)) -> (forall (t : term) (b : bool), P (RequestVoteReply t b)) -> (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term) (l0 : list entry) (l1 : logIndex), P (AppendEntries t n l t0 l0 l1)) -> (forall (t : term) (l : list entry) (b : bool), P (AppendEntriesReply t l b)) -> forall m : msg, P m
msg_sind : forall P : msg -> SProp, (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term), P (RequestVote t n l t0)) -> (forall (t : term) (b : bool), P (RequestVoteReply t b)) -> (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term) (l0 : list entry) (l1 : logIndex), P (AppendEntries t n l t0 l0 l1)) -> (forall (t : term) (l : list entry) (b : bool), P (AppendEntriesReply t l b)) -> forall m : msg, P m
msg_rect : forall P : msg -> Type, (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term), P (RequestVote t n l t0)) -> (forall (t : term) (b : bool), P (RequestVoteReply t b)) -> (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term) (l0 : list entry) (l1 : logIndex), P (AppendEntries t n l t0 l0 l1)) -> (forall (t : term) (l : list entry) (b : bool), P (AppendEntriesReply t l b)) -> forall m : msg, P m
handleTimeout_spec : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (t : term) (h' : name), handleTimeout h (snd st) = (out, st', l) -> In h' (cronies (update_elections_data_timeout h st) t) -> currentTerm (snd st) <= currentTerm st' /\ (In h' (cronies (fst st) t) \/ t = currentTerm st')
handleAppendEntriesReply_same_log : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (b : bool) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply n st src t es b = (st', l) -> log st' = log st
handleAppendEntriesReply_same_commitIndex : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (b : bool) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply n st src t es b = (st', l) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st
handleAppendEntriesReply_same_lastApplied : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (b : bool) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply n st src t es b = (st', l) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
handleRequestVote_same_log : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (ms : msg), handleRequestVote n st t c li lt = (st', ms) -> log st' = log st
handleRequestVote_same_lastApplied : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (ms : msg), handleRequestVote n st t c li lt = (st', ms) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
handleRequestVote_same_commitIndex : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (ms : msg), handleRequestVote n st t c li lt = (st', ms) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st
doLeader_spec : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> currentTerm st' = currentTerm st
doGenericServer_spec : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doGenericServer h st = (os, st', ms) -> currentTerm st' = currentTerm st
update_elections_data_appendEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) => let (_, m) := handleAppendEntries me (snd st) t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit in match m with | AppendEntriesReply t0 entries0 true => {| votes := votes (fst st); votesWithLog := votesWithLog (fst st); cronies := cronies (fst st); leaderLogs := leaderLogs (fst st); allEntries := map (fun e : entry => (t0, e)) entries0 ++ allEntries (fst st) |} | AppendEntriesReply t0 entries0 false => fst st...
handleClientRequest_spec : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', l) -> currentTerm st' = currentTerm st
applyEntries_spec : forall (es : list entry) (h : name) (st : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data), applyEntries h st es = (os, st') -> exists (d : data) (cc : list (clientId * (nat * output))), st' = RaftState.set_raft_data_clientCache term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_stateMachine term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output st d) cc
tryToBecomeLeader_same_log : forall (n : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), tryToBecomeLeader n st = (out, st', ms) -> log st' = log st
tryToBecomeLeader_same_lastApplied : forall (n : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), tryToBecomeLeader n st = (out, st', ms) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
doLeader_same_log : forall (st : raft_data) (n : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader st n = (os, st', ms) -> log st' = log st
cronies_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : name) (h' : Net.name) (t : term), In h (cronies (fst (nwState net h')) t) -> t <= currentTerm (snd (nwState net h')) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments cronies_term {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
handleTimeout_commitIndex : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h st = (out, st', l) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st
handleTimeout_lastApplied : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h st = (out, st', ps) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
doGenericServer_commitIndex : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doGenericServer h st = (out, st', ms) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st
raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es res -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
handleRequestVoteReply_same_lastApplied : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (v : bool), lastApplied (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v) = lastApplied st
handleRequestVoteReply_same_log : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (v : bool), log (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v) = log st
handleRequestVoteReply_same_commitIndex : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (v : bool), commitIndex (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v) = commitIndex st

```coq
unfold handleAppendEntries in |- *.
intros h st t n pli plt es ci H.
destruct (handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci) as [st' m].
rewrite H in *.
destruct m as [|[|]|]; try discriminate.
inversion H0; subst.
unfold currentTerm, RaftState.currentTerm in |- *.
unfold logIndex, logTerm in |- *.
simpl.
unfold lastApplied in |- *.
apply handleAppendEntries_same_lastApplied in H.
assumption.
Qed.```

original: unfold handleAppendEntries in |- *. intros h st t n pli plt es ci H. destruct (handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci) as [st' m]. rewrite H in *. destruct m as [|[|]|]; try discriminate. inversion H0; subst. unfold currentTerm, RaftState.currentTerm in |- *. unfold logIndex, logTerm in |- *. simpl. unfold lastApplied in |- *. apply handleAppendEntries_same_lastApplied in H. auto.
